item.title: Validating FTP traffic scenarios with Azure Firewall
item.description:
Written by Gopikrishna Kannan (Head of Products: Azure Firewall and Firewall Manager)
Introduction: The Azure Firewall is a cloud-native and intelligent network firewall security service that can be integrated into many different use cases. It’s a fully stateful firewall as a service with built-in high availability and unrestricted cloud scalability that provides both east-west and north-south traffic inspection.
